entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 09:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Precipitation
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm except 5 mm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Fog patches. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
